Package Standardizer

Class AbstractStandardizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Standardizer.AbstractStandardizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtStandardizer, CommaStandardizer, ConditionalStandardizer, FnFrmStandardizer, LetStandardizer, MultiParameterStandardizer, OpStandardizer, RecStandardizer, SimultaniousStandardizer, TupleStandardizer, WhereStandatdizer, WithinStandardizer
    public abstract class AbstractStandardizer
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractStandardizer is the base abstract class for standardizers
